DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics efficacy QAX576 patient idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy QAX576 Patients With Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis ( IPF )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Diagnosis Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis ( IPF ) , base appropriate clinical definition IPF detail ATS/ERS/JRS/ALAT Statement : Idiopathic Pulmonary Fibrosis : Evidencebased Guidelines Diagnosis Management Diagnosis must confirm diagnostic HRCT surgical lung biopsy . A 6minute walk test ( 6MWT ) distance â‰¥50 meter Screening ( use supplemental oxygen allow ) . Exclusion criterion Smokers ( use tobacco product previous 3 month ) . Urine cotinine level measure screening subject . Smokers define subject report tobacco use urine cotinine level range define 'smokers ' per local lab . Lung residual volume > 120 % predict Screening .
